text: SUBQUERY RESTRICTIONS 1. The BETWEEN operator cannot be used with a subquery 2. The BETWEEN operator can be used within a subquery 3. You cannot include text, unitext, or image datatypes in subqueries 4. Subqueries cannot manipulate their results internally, that is, a subquery cannot include the order by clause, the compute clause, or the into keyword. 5. More than one level correlated subquery not allowed
